about_the_game:
A member of the G.A.G corporation, your ear-to-brain connection device is broken in an accident involving moving alien products. Now that your mind is free, you realize the horrors of the company and it's quest for world domination. Armed with your two standard issue pistols, you plan to save the earth and free the will of the other humans if possible. It won't be easy. The company has millions of zombies, robots, pirates, and brainwashed soldiers just like you once were. You'll either obliterate the evil corporation and it's mysterious allies or die trying.

Brain Syndrome VR is a FPS, cell shaded, bullet hell game that can be played single player or local multiplayer. You can play the game in either VR (the recommended way) or just as a standard fps game if you so chose. The local multiplayer works by allowing the VR player and the PC player to play at the same time. To join in on PC, simply push enter on the keyboard. The game contains over 12 levels, an assortment of 7 weapons, and loads of enemies. For more info visit https://www.brainsyndromevr.com/

name: Brain Syndrome VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1.19 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1.19 GB available space

short_description: Brain Syndrome VR is a FPS bullet hell shooter featuring a cell shaded art style and an option for local multiplayer. Even though the game has VR in the title, it can be played without it. The game has more than 12 hand crafted levels ready for you to explore.
